medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began the night before admission with reported pain during urination and small quantity urination. The patient appeared to have decreased appetite and had episodes of nonbloody diarrhea in the morning. The pain was rated at 4 on a scale of 0 to 10. The condition progressed to include a palpable abdominal mass.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Eczema as an infant; delayed speech.
medical_history.family_history: Brother had hypospadias; maternal grandfather had lymphoma.
medical_history.social_history: Lived with mother and other relatives; did not attend daycare.
